data.title: Stagehand

params.title: AI Model Name
params.caption: Enter the AI provider and model name, separated by a slash.

params.title: AI Base URL
params.caption: If using a custom endpoint for AI inference (e.g. Ollama), enter the URL here.

params.title: Log AI Inference
params.caption: Optionally capture and attach all the AI inference summary logs (for debugging).

params.title: Width
params.caption: Enter the desired browser window width in pixels.

params.title: Height
params.caption: Enter the desired browser window height in pixels.

params.title: Capture Video
params.caption: Choose whether to capture and attach a video of the browser session always, only on error, or never.

params.title: Verbosity Level
params.caption: Select the verbosity level of the job output.  0 is quietest, 2 is loudest.

params.title: AI Timeout
params.caption: Number of milliseconds to wait for AI to run an action.

params.title: DOM Timeout
params.caption: Number of milliseconds to wait for DOM selectors to locate their targets.

params.title: Navigation Timeout
params.caption: Number of milliseconds to wait for navigation events (page loads).

params.title: Step Delay
params.caption: Number of milliseconds to wait between steps, to help ensure stability.

params.title: Script
params.caption: Enter your list of instructions for the browser to perform, one per line.  It can be plain text or JSON.  See [xyplug-stagehand](https://github.com/pixlcore/xyplug-stagehand) for details.
params.value:
Navigate to https://mycompany.com/
Type "foo" into the Username text field.
Type "bar" into the Password text field.
Click the "Login" button.
Sleep for 3000

data.notes: A Stagehand event plugin for the xyOps Workflow Automation System. This package provides an AI-powered browser automation framework for xyOps.  Using it you can drive a headless browser with simple English instructions, take actions, extract data, capture network requests, and even record a video of the whole session.
